Package org.glassfish.jersey.message.filtering

Support for Entity Data Filtering in Jersey.

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    EntityFilteringFeature
    Feature used to add support for Entity Data Filtering feature for entity-filtering annotations based on EntityFiltering meta-annotation.
    SecurityAnnotations
    Convenience utility methods for creating instances of security annotations.
    SecurityEntityFilteringFeature
    Feature used to add support for Java Security annotations (javax.annotation.security) for Entity Data Filtering feature.
    SelectableEntityFilteringFeature
    Feature used to add support for custom query parameter filtering for Entity Data Filtering feature.
    SelectableEntityProcessor  
    SelectableScopeResolver  
  • Annotation Types Summary 
    Annotation Type Description
    EntityFiltering
    Meta-annotation used to create entity filtering annotations for entity (model) classes and resource methods and resources.

Package org.glassfish.jersey.message.filtering Description

Support for Entity Data Filtering in Jersey.

To use Entity Data Filtering one of the provided features has to be registered in an application:

  • EntityFilteringFeature - adds support for entity-filtering annotations based on EntityFiltering meta-annotation.
  • SecurityEntityFilteringFeature - add support for entity-filtering using Java Security annotations (javax.annotation.security).

To define own entity-filtering annotations, refer to the EntityFiltering meta-annotation.

Since:
2.3
